channel.title: Droid Bionic vs HTC Thunderbolt?
channel.description:
Getting a new phone in a few hours, and I've narrowed it down to these two. Anyone have any experience with either? Neither has a CM port yet, so I'm stuck with Moroblur/HTC Sense for now. Thoughts?
I'd get the Galaxy S2, but I'm not going back to AT&T and their horrible customer service, and Sprint has no coverage where I'm going to be using the phone most of the time. So my mind is set on Verizon, and I've pretty much narrowed it down to these two phones, but I'm definitely open to other suggestions. [b]Please no iPhone unless you can sell me on it 100% within an hour[/b] ;D

item.title: Droid Bionic vs HTC Thunderbolt?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

xryz:

the bionic is dual-core and 16gb of internal storage, and the thunderbolt is just a single-core and only has 8gb of internal storage.

They claim 16GB, but Verizon sells it with 8GB internal w/ a 16GB MicroSD. I’d have to double check on the Thunderbolt when I can get a hold of my mom’s later. I’m disappointed over the auto focus delay on the camera though. It’s almost worth it to record in 1080p and capture frames on the computer to get what you want

Read full topic

item.title: Droid Bionic vs HTC Thunderbolt?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I got the bionic, and I must say… It is noticeably lighter and thinner than the thunderbolt is. Can’t tell too much on the processor, but I’m sure it is doing its job nicely. Got charged an arm and a leg for all kinds of pointless fees, but I think it was worth it

Read full topic

item.title: Droid Bionic vs HTC Thunderbolt?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

My phone completely died, so I don’t have a choice to wait, I rely on it for work, and 6 days without the extra on-call pay is going to hurt. My mom has the thunderbolt, so I guess it is really going to just come down to how well I like the bionic in the store

Read full topic

item.title: Droid Bionic vs HTC Thunderbolt?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

WAIT TILL DROID PRIME COMES OUT. Its suppose to be coming out october 11th. if it doesnt come out in the next few days it shouldnt be long. http://www.droid-life.com/2011/09/08/rumored-nexus-prime-specs-leak-out-curve-4-65-hd-screen/ i just found out that its rumored to be released october 11th with the google search i just did.

edit: idk if this will help any but heres a link over the same discussion: http://www.droidforums.net/forum/motorola-droid-bionic/115283-droid-bionic-htc-thunderbolt-8.html I don’t really stay up-to-date on verizon wireless phone since i have sprint. we would have verizon but they screwed us so we dropped them. I really have coverage at my house but i get full bars at my apartment on sprint. gl though.

Read full topic
